content: inspired by the geometric mosaic tiles of morocco the casablanca throw pillow adds a hint of desert elegance to your space this mosaic crochet throw pillow pattern creates a stylish accent pillow that looks amazing with most contemporary decor styles **materials ** to make one pillow two panels you will need the following supplies -size 7 4 5 mm crochet hook -we crochet/knit picks simply alpaca aran yarn in the following colours -2 skeins 492 yards alaina - colour a -2 skeins 492 yards aldous - colour b -scissors -20 x 20 pillow form -measuring tape **measurements ** this pattern is for a 20 x 20 throw pillow ﻿**skill level ** ﻿intermediate
